task.title: Set closed-caption styles
task.shortdesc:
You can style the closed-caption text with
methods.

step.cmd: Wait for the MediaPlayer to have at least the PREPARED status (see ).
To change the styling settings, do one of the following:

choices.choice: Use the ClosedCaptionStylesBuilder helper class (operates on ClosedCaptionStyles behind the scenes).

step.info: Setting the closed-caption style is an asynchronous operation so it might take up to a few seconds for the changes to appear on the screen.
